Author: Historical_Bend_2629

Comment: This is the number one story about Trump that every responsible business and political journalist, as well as every media outlet should be highlighting.  This is about abuse of public office on an eye-watering scale, on a scale that has never been seen before.   Trump is dipping his grubby hands into the business of government, taking every opportunity to enrich himself at the expense of the American taxpayer.  If allowed to continue like this, he will use his position during the next four years to siphon off hundreds of billions of dollars into his own pocket.   This is no longer about politics of the right or left, this is about politics of the right or wrong and what Trump is doing is monumentally wrong.
Author: crazybones
